entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
